feed.title: Manyfold Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.95.1
entry.content:
Quick bugfix for SSL certificate verification on SMTP connections.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Set SSL verify mode as string, not symbol by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3415

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.95.0...v0.95.1

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.96.0
entry.content:
This release brings the ability to rename files, finally! You can rename individually or in bulk, and the file list inside a model now takes subdirectory paths into account in its groupings, so you can really get organised!

We also now index archive files, Prusa binary GCode, and HTML & Word documents. And on top of all that, we've had some great community contributions, like password strength settings, bulk updating models across all pages, and amazinglty, a complete translation into Dutch!

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • File renaming by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3416
  • Use full file path for grouping inside models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3417
  • Index Prusa's Binary GCode (.bgcode) files by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3418
  • Include archive files when indexing existing files on disk by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3419
  • Index HTML and Word documents by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3420
  • Dynamically set file grouping size based on number of files by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3421
  • Rename files in bulk by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3425
  • Added environment variable to set required password quality by @fhp in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3428
  • Test email feature by @matthewbadeau in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3429
  • Add Dutch (nl) translation by @fhp in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3431
  • Add "Update All Models" functionality to bulk edit models by @fhp in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3430

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix missing breadcrumb on file edit page by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3426
  • Fix display of "printed" state by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3436

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Add a form helper for checkbox inputs by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3422
  • Use checkbox row helper by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3427
  • Add translations for bulk file renaming fields by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3438
  • Add total model count to update all button by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3439

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.95.1...v0.96.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.97.0
entry.content:
A small release with support for indexing Fusion360 and Inventor files, plus a bugfix for the "update all" button in the last release.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Add support for Fusion360 and Inventor files by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3445

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix "update all" button by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3446

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Minor translation updates by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3443
  • Minor polish translation update by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3444

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.96.0...v0.97.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.97.1
entry.content:
Bugfixes for model merging and submitting reports.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix errors when merging models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3448
  • Fix error when members try to report models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3449
  • Don't show site settings link to members by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3450

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.97.0...v0.97.1

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.98.0
entry.content:
Various bugfixes and background improvements, and an option to disable the "running as root" warning for when you KNOW it's really safe to do so, like on a PaaS.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • add SUDO_RUN_UNSAFELY env var to disable root security warning by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3465

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Add option for whether or not to use path-style URLs for non-AWS S3 services by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3458
  • Fix s3 path-style parameter filtering by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3459
  • Fix case-sensitivity in public IDs by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3461
  • Fix unfollowing remote actors by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3470

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • add concrete type field to creator activitypub objects by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3460
  • Configure SSL and hostname in dev mode for use with ngrok tunnels by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3467
  • Add concrete type to User activitystreams representation by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3468
  • Add trust & safety category to release notes by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3469

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.97.1...v0.98.0
